message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has the potential to revolutionize your business and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $1000000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product at such a reasonable price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $960000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while also allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking to get closer to the product's true value to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $970000. This is a fair price considering the benefits the product will bring to your business. I'm open to further discussion and willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
